name: Furr
description:
A 2D short platform game about a creature searching for its offsprings and battling wolves. 

This game was my coursework for my programming module, therefore all the scripts for it were done by me in C#. The game was done in Unity.

I have learned more things from developing this project, such as creating nested classes in a game manager, and got a better hold of coroutines now. 

Overall I enjoyed working on this small project and I quite like how it came out.

All the artwork credits go to their owners.
